issue.summary: clone AC002428.1 contains a premature termination codon within FBXL21; evidence points to a genuine polymorphism
issue.description: FBXL21 contains a premature termination codon on the genome sequence (clone AC002428.1); transcript evidence points to a genuine polymorphism
issue.resolution_text: FBXL21 will be maintained as a pseudogene as there are no 1000-Genomes reads that disagree with the Reference at this position.

issue.summary: incorrect clone name, AC013751 should be RP11-298N6
issue.description: AC013751 (chr5) should be called RP11-298N6. Its current name RP11-298P6 belongs to AC109465 (chr8).
issue.resolution_text: Clone name for AC013751.6 was curated to RP11-298N6 for the TPF/AGP.

issue.summary: Chrom 5 Pre-Telomere Gap
issue.status_text: Currently reviewing alignments in the region.
issue.description: Chromosome 5 sequence does not extend into q telomeric repeat.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: 2-base deletion in AC138956 affecting variant of NOP16
issue.description: Deletion of AC or CA in a short AC dinucleotide repeat stretch on reverse strand of AC138956 affects a coding splice variant of the NOP16 gene. Associated SNPs rs35852088 and rs56989856 are non-validated.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-conting KF459629.1 was added to GRCh38 to patch the indel in AC138956.3 and correct the alignment of an NOP16 variant to the Reference.

issue.summary: Potential genome sequence error in AC008447.8 affects translation of a PPIP5K2 splice variant
issue.description: A potential genome sequence error in clone AC008447.8 affects the translation of an alternatively spliced exon of the PPIP5K2 gene.
issue.resolution_text: The switchpoint of the overlap between AC008447.8 and AC011362.2 has been curated to include AC011362's sequence in the overlap, correcting the translation of an alternatively spliced exon of the PPIP5K2 gene in GRCh37.

issue.summary: Chr. 5 CHORI-17 Pathway: PCDHB13 (Gene ID: 56123)
issue.description: Clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AC005754.1 and AC005618.1 region of Chr. 5. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: The CHORI-17 TPF has been uploaded to the Chromosome 5 TPF and the Chromosome 5 patches TPF.

issue.summary: Hsa5- unannotated problem region
issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an insertion within AC094101.3
issue.resolution_text: AC094101.3/RP11-386K10 is a valid deletion allele. The insertion allele will be dealt with in HG-2300.

issue.summary: Missing sequence from GRCh37 related to AC024589.5?
issue.description: Alignments of HuRef and YH1 to GRCh37 suggest there is sequence absent from GRCh37 that is related in some way to sequence found in reference component AC024589 (RP11-42L13).
issue.resolution_text: AC025771.6 represents an alternate haplotype than NC_00005.9 reference component AC024589.5. It has an ~9kb insertion and ~300bp inversion relative to AC024589.5.

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC214074.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383530.1 created to capture sequence from AC214074.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: This issue duplicates HG-974.

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC207995.2 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383531.1 created to capture sequence from AC207995.2 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: AC207995.2, which represents a sequence variant to GRCh37 by containing 5480bp more than component AC091996.3, has been uploaded to the Chr. 5 Alt-Ref-Loci TPF

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC222569.2 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383532.1 created to capture sequence from AC222569.2 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: AC222569.2, which represents a sequence variant to GRCh37 by containing ~20.1kb more than component AC106790.3, has been uploaded to the Chr. 5 Alt-Ref-Loci TPF.

issue.summary: GeneID: 641700 (ECSM2), assembly gap
issue.status_text: We will attempt to re-PCR this region as we did not have sufficient data.
issue.description: Celera assembly appears to fill this gap and DQ462572.1 aligns across a gap in reference chr. 5 between components AC142391.2 and AC138517.2.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr. 5 CHORI-17 Pathway: OCLN (Gene ID: 100506658)
issue.description: Clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AC139277.2 - AC138832.2 region of Chr. 5. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: This CH17 pathway has been added to the Chrom. 5 ALT_REF_LOCI_2 TPF as an alternate, single haplotype of the SMA locus.

issue.summary: There is a gap between components AC188049.2 and AC138517.2 in GRCh37 (NC_000005.9).
issue.status_text: WGS sequence AEKP01000945.1 was added to this gap in GRCh38, extending off of AC188049.2. Also, WGS sequences ABBA01026462.1 and AEKP01000946.1 were added, extending off of AC138517.2. Looking for sequence to extend off of these components.
issue.description: There is a gap between components AC188049.2 and AC138517.2 in GRCh37 (NC_000005.9).
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap between components AC125791.2 and AC233766.2 in GRCh37 (NC_000005.9).
issue.status_text: WGS sequences ABBA01026208.1 and AEKP01002042.1 were added for GRCh38 (NC_000005.10), extending off of AC125791.2. WGS sequence AEKP01002043.1 was also added, extending off of AC233766.2. We are currently looking for sequence to extend off of these components.
issue.description: This gap issue is a continuation of HG-727.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 56127 (PCDHB9), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_019119.3 (PCDHB9) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: The CHORI-17 TPF has been uploaded to the Chromosome 5 TPF and the Chromosome 5 patches TPF.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC226057.1 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC226057.1 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: AC145546.3 was added to the Chrom. 5 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC207062.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC207062.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: AC207062.3 was added to the Chrom. 5 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC208300.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC208300.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: AC208300.3 was added to the Chrom. 5 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Hsa5- LOC441066/LOC389281 problem region
issue.status_text: CH17 clones CH17-162M17 and CH17-415A2 will be sequenced here.
issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains a deletion between AC139792.2 and AC137781.2
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC091841.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC091841.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: AC091841.3 was added to the Chrom. 5 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence for GRCh38

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC114936.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC114936.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: AC114936.2 was added to the Chrom. 5 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC234851.4 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC234851.4 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: AC234851.4 has been added to the Chr. 5 ALT_REF_LOCI_TPF_1 to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC236592.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference Assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC236592.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference Assembly
issue.resolution_text: AC236592.3 was added to the Chrom. 5 ALT_REF_LOCI_2 TPF to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence for GRCh38.

issue.summary: AC010362.6: different clone names in TPF files
issue.description: Two different local names for AC010362.6 appear in GRC TPF files. This has no effect on assembly sequence. The GRC will investigate and edit the files as needed.
issue.resolution_text: The Chr. 5 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 has been re-submitted, correcting AC010362.6's clone name (CTD-20377I18 to CTD-2037I18).

issue.summary: Fosmid AC208067.2 (ABC10-44679300J6) contains a 6450bp insertion relative to Reference components AC140172.3 and AC093274.4.
issue.description: Fosmid AC208067.2 (ABC10-44679300J6) contains an insertion relative to the Reference Assembly.
issue.resolution_text: AC208067.2 (ABC10-44679300J6) has been added to the Chr. 5 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF, capturing a 6450bp insertion allele.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC122710.3
issue.status_text: Determining whether or not we add this to the Reference as a patch/alt.
issue.description: Analysis of GU267420.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 5, suggest there may be ~1,362 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC122710.3. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC010629.8
issue.status_text: Awaiting decision on how to handle the tickets that are identified at 'Variation'.
issue.description: Analysis of GU267282.1 and GU268463.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 5, suggest there may be ~3,304 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC010629.8. This may represent variation or an assembly error. This deletion occurs at the following coordinates: NC_000005.10:9,970,738 AC010629.8:48,482
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC010631.6
issue.status_text: Awaiting decision on how to handle the tickets that are identified at 'Variation'.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268205.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 5 suggest there may be ~1,591 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC010631.6. This may represent variation or an assembly error. This deletion occurs at the following coordinates: NC_000005.10:36,562,338 AC010631.6:39,850
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC026407.4
issue.status_text: This issue is currently being reviewed.
issue.description: Analysis of GU267111.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 5, suggest there may be ~3,724 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC026407.4. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: AUXG01000271.1 needs added near the chr. 5 centromere in GRCh38.
issue.description: AUXG01000271.1 was added near the chr. 5 centromere in GRCh38 (NC_000005.10)
issue.resolution_text: AUXG01000271.1 was added to the Reference Assembly, extending off of AC125787.2 and into centromeric repeat of Chr. 5 for GRCh38.

issue.summary: There is a 10kb deletion allele from Chr. 5 not represented in the Reference.
issue.description: There is a 10kb deletion allele from Chr. 5 not represented in the Reference.
issue.resolution_text: Since this deletion is a clean deletion and does not add any new sequence to the Reference or affect transcript alignment, this issue will be resolved.

issue.summary: GeneID: 56132 (PCDHB3), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.status_text: This issue is currently under review.
issue.description: The Reference contains a mismatch with GeneID: 56132 (PCDHB3).
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Fosmid alignment points to the Reference containing a 6kb insertion affecting XR_246556.1 (LOC285638).
issue.description: Fosmid alignment points to the Reference containing a 6kb insertion affecting XR_246556.1 (LOC285638).
issue.resolution_text: Gene alignment is unaffected by the addition of the ~6kb insertion sequence provided by AC241990.1 and AC245137.1. Since this does not appear to be an error in AC008467.7 (WGS piece ABBA01069092.1 also contains the insertion allele) this will not be added as an Alt_loci as it does not add any substantial, unique sequence.

issue.summary: GeneID: 56979 (PRDM9), rare allele PRDM9 B is represented in the Reference Assembly.
issue.status_text: This issue is currently under review.
issue.description: Common alleles of PRDM9 (GeneID: 56979) are not represented in the Reference.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 375444 (C5orf34), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: Possible mis-assembly of component AC114956.2 affecting C5orf34 (GeneID: 375444).
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF457895.2 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC114956.2 and improving the alignment of C5orf34 to the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 2297 (FOXD1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_004472.2 (FOXD1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: CHM1 WGS sequence AMYH02011562.1 has been added to GRCh38 to patch AC099522.3 and correct the alignment of FOXD1 to the Reference.

issue.summary: Hsa5- RUFY1/LOC389352 problem region
issue.status_text: We will sequence CH17-213J18 to correct this inversion
issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an inversion between AC136604.2 and AC113426.2
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 4090 (SMAD5), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_005903.5 (SMAD5) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF573707.1 has been added to GRCh38 to patch the indel in AC009014.5 and correct the alignment of SMAD5.

issue.summary: GeneID: 9522 (SCAMP1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_004866.4 (SCAMP1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF510914.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching the indel in AC010585.6 and correcting the alignment of SCAMP1.

issue.summary: GeneID: 26999 (CYFIP2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the protein encoded by RefSeq NM_001037333.1 (CYFIP2) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459628.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching the indel in AC009185.6 and correcting the alignment of CYFIP2.

issue.summary: GeneID: 1843 (DUSP1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There are sequence discrepancies in the alignment between genomic clone AC022217.5 and RefSeq NM_004417.2 (DUSP1).
issue.resolution_text: PCR product (accession number FJ695205) has been submitted to Genbank that fixes the deletion in the Reference.

issue.summary: Chr.5 Gap Problem Region #1
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC138990.2 and AC120120.2.
issue.resolution_text: With the addition of WGS sequences ABBA01062172.1, AEKP01071076.1 and ABBA01069290.1, to the Chrom. 5 TPF, this sequence gap is now closed.

issue.summary: deletion in AC114982.2 affecting the SLRN gene.
issue.description: A 1bp deletion of a "G" in human chr5 BAC AC114982.2 affects the translation of the SLRN gene. None of the cDNAs or ESTs that match here support the genomic sequence.
issue.resolution_text: PCR product (accession FJ695194) has been submitted to Genbank. Deletion in Reference is now resolved.

issue.summary: Aligment for AC106774.2 and AC113415.3 causing contig building problems
issue.description: AC106774.2 and AC113415.3 can align in multiple orientations, causing problems for contig building.
issue.resolution_text: AC113415.3 is no longer on the TPF so no longer an alignment issue between AC106774.2 and AC113415.3.

issue.summary: Unplaced contig NT_113890 appears to be redundant to reference chromosome
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113890 may be redundant to sequence on reference chromosome 5.
issue.resolution_text: The status of AC016572.6 has been updated to redundant on the GRC curator page.

issue.summary: Unplaced contig NT_113910 (chr. 8) may be redundant to reference chromosome 5
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113910 (chr.8) may be redundant to reference chromosome 5
issue.resolution_text: NT_113910 (AC145144.2) has been verified to be redundant and will not be used in the assembly.

issue.summary: Unplaced contig NT_113948 contains centromeric sequence
issue.status_text: It appears by admixture mapping that this may belong to the centromeric region of chromosome 5
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113948 contains centromeric sequence
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr. 5 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC125791.2 and AC140677.1.
issue.resolution_text: Further progress on this gap issue can be followed in HG-1396.

issue.summary: Chr. 5 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.status_text: With the unresolved tandem repeat in the region, this gap is now stalled.
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC106774.2 and AC233724.2.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 730394 (GTF2H2D), missing in assembly
issue.description: NM_001042490.3 was annotated on the AC138827.3 component in build 36.3 on the c5_H2 alternative haplotype contig (NT_113801.1, Hs5_111520), but this component is absent in the GRCh37 assembly.
issue.resolution_text: AC138827 will be represented on an alternate locus in GRCh38. It is currently available as a novel patch for GRCh37: GL339449.2. This patch is an alternate representation of the SMA region.

issue.summary: Possible HuRef WGS to fill Chr.5 gap between AC134821.2 and AC138522.2
issue.description: Sequence from HuRef WGS contig NW_001838952.2 may span the gap in Reference chromosome 5 between AC134821.2 and AC138522.2
issue.resolution_text: CH17-12M21 (AC233964) spans gap, making AC190390, AC138522 and AC138521 redundant.

issue.summary: Possible mis-assembly between AC145138 and AC044797 affecting duplicate of the OCLN gene
issue.status_text: Currently sequencing CH17 tilepath through this region.
issue.description: Possible mis-assembly between AC145138 and AC044797 affecting duplicate of the OCLN gene. The OCLN duplicate is partial, with the cut-off portion very close to the BAC boundary.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible missing sequence in assembly in region of component AC010362.6
issue.description: GRCh37 may be missing ~15kb in the vicinity of AC010362.6
issue.resolution_text: The sequence has been added to GRCh37 in NOVEL patch GL383530.1.
